infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FarmSeed Mapper uses your location to mark field boundaries, record where inventory items are stored, and save GPS coordinates for your farm entries. For example, when you add a new entry, your current location is automatically recorded so you can view it on the map later.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FarmSeed Mapper accesses your photo library so you can attach existing photos to your farm entries and inventory records. For example, you can add a photo of a crop condition or equipment to document it.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FarmSeed Mapper uses your camera to capture photos of fields, crops, equipment, and inventory items. For example, you can take a photo when creating an entry to visually document field conditions or when adding new inventory.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: FarmSeed Mapper uses your location to mark field boundaries and save GPS coordinates for your farm entries.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
